ImageSet.Name: SUMSS: Sydney University Molonglo Sky Survey (Radio)
ImageSet.Credits: The SUMSS project team and 1997-2000 School of Physics, University of Sydney. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (SUMSS, Min=0.001, Max=10).

ImageSet.Name: Westerbork Northern Sky Survey (Radio)
ImageSet.Credits: WENSS Team. The WENSS project is a collaboration between the Netherlands Foundation for Research in Astronomy (NFRA/ASTRON) and the Leiden Observatory. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (WENSS, Min=0.001, Max=10), who got it from the WENSS FTP site 1999-03-18. The original data was found using the Westerbork Synthesis Radio Telescope, which is operated by NFRA/ASTRON with support from the Netherlands Foundation for Scientific Research (NWO).

ImageSet.Name: VLSS: VLA Low-frequency Sky Survey (Radio)
ImageSet.Credits: VLSS Cohen, A. S.; Lane, W. M.; Cotton, W. D.; Kassim, N. E.; Lazio, T. J. W.; Perley, R. A.; Condon, J. J.; Erickson, W. C.; Served From NASA Skyview

ImageSet.Name: HI All-Sky Continuum Survey (Radio)
ImageSet.Credits: Max Planck Institute for Radio Astronomy, generated by Glyn Haslam using data taken at Jodrell Bank, Effelsberg and Parkes telescopes. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (408MHz, Min=10, Max=200).

ImageSet.Name: VLA FIRST: Faint Images of the Radio Sky at Twenty-centimeters
ImageSet.Credits: The FIRST project team: R.J. Becker, D.H. Helfand, R.L. White M.D. Gregg. S.A. Laurent-Muehleisen. 1994, University of California.

ImageSet.Name: Bonn 1420 MHz Survey (Radio)
ImageSet.Credits: Max Planck Institute for Radio Astronomy, generated by Patricia Reich and Wolfgang Reich using with the Bonn Stockert 25m telescope. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (1420MHz, Min=3000, Max=35000).

ImageSet.Name: NVSS: NRAO VLA Sky Survey (Radio)
ImageSet.Credits: National Radio Astronomy Observatory. The NVSS project includes J. J. Condon, W. D. Cotton, E. W. Greisen, Q. F. Yin, R. A. Perley (NRAO), and J. J. Broderick (VPI). TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope.
